topic.title: How to create an Invoice
topic.shortdesc: An invoice is a document that records a transaction between a buyer and a seller. If goods or services were purchased on credit, the invoice usually specifies the terms of the deal and provides information on the available methods of payment. There are different types of invoices which may include a receipt, a bill of sale, debit note, or sales invoice.

ol.li: Under the sales tab, click on inovices. This will bring you to a screen that will allow you to start an invoice.
Start by adding your logo to the invoice. This will allow documents to have your brand on it so customers can see who its from.
Select a template for the invoice. It is based on your personal preference as there are many to choose from. This will be the layout of your invoice.
Chose the accent color for your document. It is best to choose a similar color to your brand to match.
Click "Looks great, let's go". If you do not want to customize your invoice. You can skip it by clicking skips this.

Once on the next screen, fillout the invoice title and the summary of what the invoice is. The name of the invoice should be something recognizable.You want to be as descriptive as possible for the summary.
Add the customer you would like to send the bill to.
Type in the S.O/P.O and Invoice number.
Choose the date when the esitmate started and ended.
Add the cost by choosing the product.
Describe the product in the description. Its best to be descriptive as possible.
Add the quantity of the product.
Add the price and tax of the product.
Select the type of currency the estimate has. Wave Financial has a vast selection of currency to choose from.
Fill out the notes and footer if needed.
Click save and the invoice will be added.
The next screen will ask to approve the draft. Click approve and it will send the invoice to the customer.
The draft will be created and it will send it to your customer. You will need to wait until the customer pays for the invoice.
